<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/2.0/settings/notification/rooms"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Sets a notification status for a room with the ID specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"roomsId":{"description":"The target room identifier.","nullable":true,"example":{"int":1234,"string":"some text","boolean":true}},"mute":{"type":"boolean","description":"Specifies whether the notifications will be delivered to the specified room or not.","example":true}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The request parameters for configuring notification settings for the chat or collaboration rooms.","title":"RoomsNotificationsSettingsRequestDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Room notification settings","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"response":{"type":"object","properties":{"disabledRooms":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object"},"description":"The list of rooms with the disabled notifications.","nullable":true,"example":[{"int":1234,"string":"some text","boolean":true}]}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The rooms notification settings.","title":"RoomsNotificationSettingsDto"},"count":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"links":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"href":{"type":"string"},"action":{"type":"string"}}}},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"statusCode":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}},"title":"RoomsNotificationSettingsWrapper"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
